tool_description:
AI-based Keyword Suggestions tool.  
AI suggestions may offer less accurate search volume data, but they provide a better perspective on possible keywords and content opportunities

Our classic keywords suggestions  tool - https://rapidapi.com/barvanet-barvanet-default/api/seo-tools-keyword-research
name: SEO tools - AI-based Keyword Suggestions
title: SEO tools - AI-based Keyword Suggestions

api_list.name: AIKeywordSuggestions
api_list.description:
AI-based Keyword Suggestions Tool for SEO. Find relevant keywords for your business or website.
**Important! ** Please note that AI recommendations query may require 30-60 seconds to complete

AI-based keyword suggestions API output includes 3 types of keywords :
“keywords0-50” - low difficulty keywords
"keywords50-100" - high difficulty keywords
"questions" - content and blog post recommendations

Keyword line example - [“best seo tools”, “70”, “4500”] where:
“best seo tools” - keyword
"70" - keyword difficulty
"4500" - average search volume
